attributes.action: Keep dermatology clinics as they are
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to happen as it takes a lot of space and areas to deal with some very complex skin conditions
attributes.background: Dermatology at university hospital Coventry has cared for my 87yr old mother for many many years. I heard yesterday that there are plans to close the clinic as it stands and moving it to a much smaller space. This will have terrible effects on hundreds of patients with varying skin issue

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the NHS Trust responsible for University Hospital Coventry, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to contact your local MP about this matter:
https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
